mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DT_BOARD JOIN BOARD_FILE ON(DT_BOARD.DT_NO = BOARD_FILE.F_DTNO) JOIN MEMBER ON(DT_MNO = MEMBER.M_NO) WHERE DT_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_BOARD (DT_NO, DT_TYPE, DT_TITLE, DT_CONTENT, DT_COUNT, DT_MNO, STATUS) VALUES('DT'||DT_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{dt_Type}, #{dt_Title}, #{dt_Content}, 0, #{dt_Mno}, 'Y')

SELECT DT_BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE(F_NO, F_DTNO, F_TYPE, F_NAME, F_CNAME, F_UPLOADDATE) VALUES(BOARD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'DT'||#{dt_No}, '1', #{f_Name}, #{f_Cname}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT DT.*, (SELECT M_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE M_NO = DT.DT_MNO) NICK, (SELECT F_CNAME FROM BOARD_FILE WHERE F_DTNO = DT.DT_NO) NO FROM DT_BOARD DT WHERE DT_NO = #{dt_No}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE(F_NO, F_DTNO, F_TYPE, F_NAME, F_CNAME, F_UPLOADDATE) VALUES (BOARD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{f_Dtno}, '1', #{f_Name}, #{f_Cname}, SYSDATE )
